name: Super Clown 3: Revenge
description:
STORY:
Super Clown is again only Brave hero who can beat evil Sorcerer and Super zombie and their evil army. Sorcere and Super zombie have captured peace stars. Those stars keep peace in world but now that peace is disturbed and Super clown is again who hole world trust. So play this 3d platformer game and defeat bosses and evil army

Every level player Super clown need avoid enemies like slow zombies, following slimes and turrets who shoot bunnies. Levels also may contain deathly wooden spikes. Player can collect hearths which increase health. End of levels there are boss. It might be Super Zombie who follow player and is fast or Evil sorcerer who follows and shoot bunnies. Kill boss enemies by jumping 3 times on to his head. Then gate is disappeared and player can save Star and finish level. Some levels are open world style and some platform style where player need make accurate jumping. If player falls from map he need start again from start point. Levels may also contain falling platforms, moving platforms and jumping platforms

So be a hero and beat evil army and save Stars and return peace to the World


FEATURES:
- 16 levels
- Different enemies: Following slimes, following slow zombies, Shooting turrets which shoots bunnies
- 2 different boss needed to be kill end of levels: Fast running zombie, Sorcerer who shoots bunnies
- Traps like spikes
- Steam achievements. Player get achievement by playing level and finishing levels.
- Hearth which give more energy
- Jumping Platforms, Moving platforms, walling platforms
- Jumping platforms
- Falling from map will kill player
